projects.four-project-dates:
Sistema web automatizado para la generaci√≥n de cotizaciones de proyectos de software, impulsado por Inteligencia Artificial (Google Gemini).

üìã Descripci√≥n
Este proyecto es una aplicaci√≥n web que permite a los usuarios solicitar cotizaciones estimadas para diferentes tipos de proyectos (Sitios web, Ecommerce, Apps, etc.). Mediante un formulario interactivo, el sistema recopila los requerimientos del cliente y utiliza la API de Google Gemini para analizar los datos y generar una cotizaci√≥n preliminar detallada, incluyendo precio sugerido, tiempo estimado y entregables. Adem√°s, cuenta con un panel de administraci√≥n seguro para gestionar las solicitudes recibidas.
‚ú® Caracter√≠sticas
Cotizaci√≥n con IA: Integraci√≥n con Google Gemini para an√°lisis y estimaci√≥n de costos en tiempo real. Interfaz Moderna: Dise√±o responsivo y atractivo utilizando TailwindCSS. Panel de Administraci√≥n: Dashboard con m√©tricas clave. Listado de cotizaciones con filtros. Detalle completo de cada solicitud. Gesti√≥n de estados (Nueva, Vista, etc.). Seguridad: Autenticaci√≥n de usuarios administradores y protecci√≥n de rutas.

üõ†Ô∏è Requisitos Previos
Servidor Web (Apache/Nginx) - Se recomienda XAMPP/WAMP para desarrollo local.
PHP 7.4 o superior.
MySQL / MariaDB.
Una API Key de Google Gemini.

projects.four-project-dates:
Automated web system for generating software project quotes, powered by Artificial Intelligence (Google Gemini).

informa deco s/s y sei nforma conectarse wifi levanta ok
üìã Description

This project is a web application that allows users to request estimated quotes for different types of projects (websites, e-commerce, apps, etc.). Through an interactive form, the system gathers client requirements and uses the Google Gemini API to analyze the data and generate a detailed preliminary quote, including suggested price, estimated time, and deliverables. It also features a secure administration panel to manage received requests.

‚ú® Features
AI-powered quoting: Integration with Google Gemini for real-time cost analysis and estimation. Modern interface: Responsive and attractive design using Tailwind CSS. Administration panel: Dashboard with key metrics. List of quotes with filters. Complete details of each request. Status management (New, Viewed, etc.). Security: Authentication of administrator users and route protection.

üõ†Ô∏è Prerequisites
Web Server (Apache/Nginx) - XAMPP/WAMP is recommended for local development.
PHP 7.4 or higher.

MySQL / MariaDB.
A Google Gemini API Key.
projects.five-project-title: ‚ö™üî¥ The Biggest - Official Store This is an E-commerce Landing Page project
projects.five-project-dates:
‚ö™üî¥ The Biggest - Official Store This is an e-commerce landing page project designed for selling sportswear. The site features a modern interface, a dynamic ordering system, and an integrated admin panel for managing orders.

üöÄ Features 100% Responsive Design: Optimized for multiple resolutions, including specific mobile devices (tested at 360x775px).

Modern Style: Built with Tailwind CSS and Google Fonts (Montserrat). Ordering System: Functional form that captures customer data and stores it in memory (or an SQLite database). Admin Panel: Restricted access to view shipping requests in real time. Mobile-First: Code structure designed for mobile efficiency.

üõ†Ô∏è Technologies Used Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript (Vanilla).

Icons: Font Awesome 6.0. Backend (Proposed): PHP 8.x for server logic. Database: SQLite for lightweight and portable storage.
